title: Recharge Dragonstone

properties.name: description
properties.value: Recharge Dragonstone is a Lunar spell, requiring 89 Magic to cast. This spell recharges all enchanted dragonstone jewellery in the player's inventory to (4) charges, excluding the ring of wealth, which can only be recharged at the Fountain of Rune. content:
This article is about Lunar spellbook spell. For for the Treasure Trail reward, see Charge dragonstone jewellery scroll.
Recharge Dragonstone
Released 5 March 2015 (Update)
Members Yes
Level 89
Spellbook Lunar
Type Utility
Experience 97.5
Runes 4 1 1
Description Recharges enchanted dragonstone jewellery
Animation
Sound Effect

Recharge Dragonstone is a Lunar spell, requiring 89 Magic to cast. This spell recharges all enchanted dragonstone jewellery in the player's inventory to (4) charges, excluding the ring of wealth, which can only be recharged at the Fountain of Rune. In order to cast this spell, the player must have completed the hard Fremennik Diary and Legends' Quest.

Cost analysis[edit | edit source]

  • Cost analysis assumes the use of any staff that supplies water runes.
  • It should be noted you can do 27 per inventory with a rune pouch.
